pluginProject.description: TypeScript project to add the generator to. We recommend creating a ts#project in a top-level 'tools' directory.
pluginProject.x-prompt: Choose the TypeScript project to add the generator to

name.x-prompt: Choose a name for your generator, eg (ts#cool-project)

directory.description: The directory within the plugin project's source folder to add the generator to (default: <name>)
directory.x-prompt: Choose the directory you would like to generate the generator in relative to the project's source folder (default: <name>)
